store_info.name: VibeMart
store_info.description: Discover amazing products that match your vibe at VibeCart. Shop electronics, fashion, home goods and more with free shipping and secure checkout.

products.name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: Premium wireless headphones with noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

products.name: Smart Fitness Watch
products.description: Advanced fitness tracking with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and 7-day battery life. Water resistant up to 50m.

products.name: Designer Leather Handbag
products.description: Handcrafted genuine leather handbag with multiple compartments. Timeless design that complements any outfit.

products.name: Ceramic Dinnerware Set
products.description: 16-piece ceramic dinnerware set. Microwave and dishwasher safe. Perfect for everyday dining and special occasions.

products.name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
products.description: Soft, breathable organic cotton t-shirt in various colors. Sustainable fashion that feels great and looks amazing.

products.name: Yoga Exercise Mat
products.description: Non-slip yoga mat with extra cushioning. Made from eco-friendly materials. Perfect for yoga, pilates, and meditation.

products.name: Best Seller Novel Collection
products.description: Collection of 3 bestselling novels from acclaimed authors. Perfect for book lovers and gift giving.

products.name: Natural Skincare Set
products.description: Complete skincare routine with natural ingredients. Includes cleanser, toner, serum, and moisturizer.
